I broke my good sunglasses when we were visiting our son in Seattle. I needed something fast and didn't want to spend a lot of money. I went on Amazon and found these three sunglasses for less than $10! I Ordered them had them delivered to my son's address and the rest is history! I've had these for a year and 1/2 now and they have worked out great! Never bought another more expensive pair, because, why?! The reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is that they aren't the cutest sunglasses, I've ever had, but they are ok as far as style and they serve their purpose... keeping the sun out of your eyes!
